juzs.text: Ken fayuh (catoh) yemeete num qideeniik lakal, kay maral qaraanak qande moobisinninooy, ahak dumal bayissi hayne marah malayka numtin baysah oobise mara makkinnino
Ken baati makkinna Jibriil inki xongolót tekkeh akke waytek, usun too waqdi inkih Rabte baruuga yekken
Naqoosa geyta nadaamaay! qhiyaamah ayró digaalá yablen waqdi, Toh ken kah geytam, hebeltô farmoytay keenih yamaate mayan, kaal anqasak sugeenim akķke waytek
A-koros matablaa! Keenik naharat makina hora bayisnem horaarik? Diggah usun ken fan addunyah aduure waanam mayablaanaa
Kaadu hebeltô ginó matan qhiyaamah ayró inkih Ni- garil gaaboysimaanaah xayyoysimaanam akke waytek cisaabah
Qhiyaamah ayró ugtoonu waanamih astá lon rabte baaxó naynuwweeh, ambó teetik nayyaaqeeh, woo ambók yakmeenimit
Kaadu tet (baaxó kinnuk) addal nakilaa kee qinabak yan basaatin hayneeh, daroorik-tu tet addal nuyfuxxuke (weeqisne)
Woh inkih kah abnem kay (basaatin kinnuk) mexexuk yakmeenî gidi. Kaadu amah ken gaboobi abtem hinna Yalli isi racmattah keenih abeemikkal, aniqmatal Yalla mafaatitaanaa
Ummaanimik qaynatitte gine Rabbi Saytunnooweh, baaxó uysubukku haytaamaay ken nafsik (labim kee sayim kinnuk) kaadu usun aaxige waanamak qaynatitte gine Rabbi Saytunnooweh
Kaadu laqó kak siibna bar astáh loonuuh, usun too waqdi ditet culan, toh Yallih dudda kinni
Kaadu Yallih dudda tascasse astá lon, ayróy leh tan madabah gexxal, toh mayso-li, ixxigalih yan Yallih caggudusiyya kinni
Kaadu astá lon mafdagoogi kah caggudusne alsál, tamiirâ (nakli) foynay ragteeh makkotteh innah gacca ittam fanah
Ayróh matakka alsá eleltam, kaadu barah matakka laqók yaakumem, ummaan tiya keenik isi maroh addal giirissa
Kaadu Yallih dudda tascasse astá lon, diggah nanu ken samad kibuk tan doynikit nukkuqeemil (Nabii Nuuc doynik kinnuk)
Kaadu Nabii Nuuc doynikih innah yan dawaanikiy edde feeraana keenih ginne
Kaadu fannek ken xuumusak (sutusak) nen, tokkel usun cateyna maloonuuy, usun mawaddiiman woo xuumiyyak (sutusiyyak)
Ken cattam matan Nanu keenih abne racmattaa kee yimixxige waktî (uddurih) fan keenit abne hatkisiyya akke waytek Nel yaduureenî gidih
Ama koros addunyâ digaaláa kee akeerâ digaalák meesita Yallak nacror geytaanam keh keenik iyyan waqdi, usun too waqdi derre edde cabaanaah, kaxxa-mariinitaanah
Kaadu ken Rabbih astootik hebeltoh astáy keenih tamaate matan derre teetit cabak sugeenim akke waytek

Kaadu korosuk Yalli siinih yeceemik-tu acuwa keenik iyyan waqdi, koroosite mari yeemene marak iyyah; Yalli faxinnay askamuk yen mara naskamoo? Yeemene maraw isin massat yan mara hinniton baxxaqqa-le hoxih addat taniinih akke waytek
A-xagni mawaqdiiy isin numma yacee mara tekkeenik itta koros
Israafiil baantah inki xongolók-sa qambaalaanam malon, is garcik ken tabbixe usun sinni caagiidat keemaaritak
Tokkel usun sitta farriimaanam maduudaanaay, sinni maraa kee buxaaxî fanah ma-gacan
Nammay haytô baantá fuxsumtaah, edde luk usun too waqdi magooqak sinni Rabbî fan sissikuk yawqen
Koros nadaamitak, nee gee finqaaw! ni-magooqak (kubuuruk) nee teyyeeqem miyyaay itte? Keenil gacisak ah Yalli sinam edde xagniseemiy, farmoytit nummâ xaagu kak tecee kinni keenik iyyan
Israafiil baantah inki xongolók-sa ken ugut magooqak edde yekkem mali, eddeluk usun inkih Ni-garil gaaboysimaanaah xayyoysiman cisab kee galtóh
Woo ayró (qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk) nafsi tul ma-yandulluma. Kaadu addunyal abak sugteenimik-sa elle galtimtaanam manton keenik iyyan
Diggah woo ayró Jannatti mari ruffu edde iyyan niqmatat agxitan
Ken kee ken agabi iraawoowal yanin qaraakiy (kaqaadid) amol cusuulah anuk
Usun Jannat addal maggo qaynatah yan caxâ mixu loonuuh, faxaanaah esseraanam elle lon niqmootak
Xuwaw-le Rabbik nagaynan maxcó-lon
Woo ayró a-umeyniitow moominiinik baxsima iyyan korosuk
Yalli ken sahitak keenik iyyah ; Aadam xayloy Yi-farmoytiitih arrabal sheetan aqbude waytaanaah kaa kataate waytaanamal sin ma- farriimiyyoo, diggah usuk siinik baxxaqqa-le naqboytak
Kaadu sin ma-amrisinniyoo dibuk Yoo uqbuda iyyaanamah, ah massa-le gita. (Islaam diini kinnuk)
Nummah sheetanti maggo mara siinik cakkik makehik kas- kassoowa mara matakkaanaa a-korosey
Ah-jahannam giráy addunyal kah xagnisimak sugteeni keenik iyyan akeeral
A-saaku tet culaay, teetit carara Yallal koroositak sugteenimih sabbatah
A-saaku ken afitte alifnaah ken gaboobi neê luk yabta, kaadu ken ibitte keenil sumaaqitta addunyal abak sugen umaanéh
Faxinninoy intiita ken waysiisak neneeh, duggu keenik haak nen, toysa gitâ fanah sissikuk gexak yenen kaal taturaanamkeh, tokkel mannal yableeniih intiita ken waysisne way
Fanne nee tekkek ginó keenik korisak neneeh, ken aracal ken daffeysak nen, toysa fooca fan gexaanam duudak manannoonuvy, wadir gacaanam duudak manannon
Idoolitti iyyam fan qumri kak neyxeere num ginó kaak korisnaah, yooboke saakih innah kaa gacisna hebeebih (sabarah), amah abe Rabbi qhiyaamah ayró ken ugusu waamih dudda leemil ma kas- kassoowaanaa
Ni-farmoyta Mucammad fzsakáýo Qadar kaa mabarsinninooy, kaa ma-ceela (ma-yangibbiya) Usuk kalah luk yemeetem mali Kassis kee baxxaqqa-le Qhuraan akke waytek
Ama Qhuraanal sorkocôbaxi (lubbi) kak nuwwa mara meesiisâ gidaay, korosul digaalâ maxcó nummattamkeh
Lacak nanu keenih ginneh nanim mayablaanaa! Ni-gaboobi abteemik, eddeluk usun kaa yamlikeenih (ikoytah kaa lon)
Kaadu kaa (lac kinnuk) keenih qanneh, tokkel tu-kaak feeraanaah, tu-kaak yakmeenih
Kaadu lacat maggo tuxxiq kee can kaak nakaanam lon, a-niqmat keenih abe Rabbi ma-faatitaanaa
Kaadu koros Yallak kalah yaqbuden yallitte haysitte Yallih digaalák ken cattam keh
Ken yallitte cató keenik maduddaay, koros kee ken yallitte inkih girâ digaaláh gaaboysimaanaah xayyoysiman tu- sittah xiqe kal
Toysa a-nabiyow usun Yallal koroositaanaah, koo dirabboysaanamih maxcó koo rookise waytay, diggah nanu qellisaanam kee yaybulleenim inkih keenik naaxigeeh ken elle galtenno
Ama seehadaytuy qhiyaamah ayró yangaddee mayablannaa! Diggah nanu daacoyti tiffak kaa ginnem, tokkel usuk baxxaqqa-le giddeyna
Kaadu ama giddeyni faxxiime wayta ceelallo Neh yoogoreeh, isi ginó hawweeneh (habbaaleh). Lafoofi iyyi yaynuwwee is bululteeh, rumah anuk iyye
Kaak ixxic nabiyow; naharsi adda tet gine Rabbi tet yaynuwwe! Usuk isi ginó inkih yaaxigi, kaak qellittam matan
Usuk anxaxin cooxuk girá siinih yeyyeeqe Rabbi kinni, tokkel isin woo cooxuk girá ursuttan
Kaadu qaranwaa kee baaxó gine Rabbi seehadah innah tanim ginaah gacsam ma-duudaa? Yeey, Usuk duudah. Kaadu Usuk ummaanim giné, ummaanim yaaxigi
Yalli tu-abam faxa waqdi cagalah kay amri wohiimik tik-iyyaama, edde luk wohim edde takke
Ummaanimih reedá gabat kak tan Yalli saytunnooweeh, cisab kee galtóh kaâ fanah gacsimtan
Yalli malaykay missoowiyyah missowtal xiibite
Kaadu Yalli qamburre foorisiyyah foorissa (wakayah wakayta) Malaykal xiibite
Kaadu Qhuraan kee Dikri akriyiyyah takriye malaykal xiibite
Diggah seehaday sin Yallay taqbudeeni inkittuk qibaadá kaah caglisa iyyaanamal xiibite
Usuk qaranwaa kee baaxóoy, ken nammayih fanal taniimih Rabbi, kaadu usuk ayrô mawqooqii kee ayrô kormaamî Rabbi kinni
Diggah Nanu addunyâ qaran cutuukat bilqisneh
Kaadu ummaan sheetanay Yallih taaqatak yewqek, qaran cutuukat dacrisna
Sheetoona qaran mataafaay, irô qaraanal tan Malaykah yab taabbem madudda, kaadu ummaan kabuk qambisimta
Woo ankactuk xiiriysimaanaah, amurruqe wayta digaalá-lon akeeral
Sheetoona Malaykak sissikuk qawta qangara akke waytek yaabbeenim maduudan, tokkel ura dabiitay ken cararisa ken kataata
Nabiyow toysa ken esser ginóh usun gibdoonu innaa hinnay Nanu ginnem gibdim ginoonak? Diggah nanu xankab itta kallay gabat kaftak ken ginne (ken abba Aadam kinnuk)
Wonna hinnay nabiyow koo dirabboysaanaah, qhiyaamah ayróh ugut yangaddeenim qajjibsittah usun kol anqaasak
Hawweeneenim ken kassiisan waqdi kas elle mageyaanaay, edde mayantifiqan
Kaadu atu Nabii kinnitom tascasse astá yablen waqdi teetil anqasaanaah qajjibsitan
Kaadu atu luk temeetem kalah tu- hinna, baxxaqqa iyya baab akke waytek kaak iyyen
Rabneeh burtaay lafoofi nakke waqdi, nanu diggah nuwwuk ugtennoo ninni magooqak? (Qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk)
Kaadu nek naharsi abbobtiy warrayte ugtelee iyyen
Yeey, ugtetton keenik ixxic nabiyow; isin xixxibaaneey, qunxaane-luk
Cagalah is Israafiil baantah inki xongoló, eddeluk usun magooqak ugtaanaah sinnik abaanam qambaalitan
Nee gee finqaaw! ah cisaabaay galtóh ayró iyyan (qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk)
Ah-meklah ayróy ginô fan qadlil edde meklaanay isin dirabboysak sugteeni keenik iyyan
Malaykak iyyaanah; koroosite maraa kee koroosannul ken kataateeh ken ceela maraay, usun Yallak kalah aqbaduk sugeenim gaaboysa
Eddeluk jaciim deqsitta giráh gita keenih escessa
Kaadu siraat garil ken eyseeda, diggah usun addunyal abeenimik esserimaanahak
Maca litoonuuh, itta kah cate waytaanam addunyal itta kah catak sugten innah keenik iyyan ken sahitak
Wonna hinnay usun asaaku (qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk) Yallih amrih gabá yeceenih xixxibaane luk
Korosuk mariiy marat afkanuk keemaaritak itta esseran
Diggah isin cakki-le kabuk nee gutuqak net amaatuk sugteeniih, baatil net bilqisak sugten iyyen kattaate mari katayen marak
Katayen mari keenil gacisak, wonna hinnay isin nummayse marah ma-suginniton keenik iyyan
Kaadu nanu sin amol qandey iimaanak sin edde waasna luk masuginnino, wonna hinnay isin dambit caddok tature marah sugten
Tokkel ni-Rabbih maxcó inkih nel nummatteh, diggah nee kee sin digaalá tammoysenno
Eddeluk Yallih gitaa kee iimaanak sin makkosneh, diggah nanu siinik dumaak makkoote marah sugne
Toysa diggah usun woo ayró (qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk) digaalál yangaleenih addunyal umaanél yengeleenimih sabbatah. (kattaate maraa kee katayen mara kinnuk)
Diggah nanu umeyniitik tamannah abna
Diggah usun (koros kinnuk) inki Yallak-sa cakkil yaqbuden Yalli mayan ixxica keenik iyyan waqdi, kaxxa-mariinitak sugen addunyal
Kaadu nanu diggah ninni yallitteh qibaadá gad-abê cabulih sabbatah cabnoo iyyen? (woh kak iyyaanam Yallih farmoyta kinnuk)
Wonna hinnay Nabii cakki baaheeh (Qhuraan kee Yalla inkittoysaanam kinnuk) farmoytit nummaysak yemeete
A-korosey isin diggah qansarissa digaalá tammoysetton qhiyaamah ayró
Kaadu addunyal umaanék abak sugteenimik-sa elle galtimtaanam manton akeeral
Yallih naqoosay qibaadá kaah caglissey Yalli isi racmat caglise akke waytek qansarissa digaalák naggowtam matan
Woo meqe maray Yalli doore yimixxige quusiy (rizqhiy) aggiriqqewaa lon
Woo rizqhi maggo caxâ mixu, usun Yalli keenih abe konnabá luk
Waara niqmat-le Jannootah addal yanin
Qaraakiy amol sitta fan afkanuk
Maqiin deqsitta daráh gocoyuk kibuk yan kaaqon keenit meksima
Ama gocoy qadoh, yaaqube marah satta-le
Usuk kas mabeyaay, amô berra mali kaadu usun kaat mayaskiran (madoomitan)
Kaadu ken xaqul saytun agabuy sinni baqoltik-sá num fanah waktewaay, qax-meqe intiita-le lon
Ama agbih weeló dansinte naalay gabá xage wayteh inna-le qidih
Tokkel jannatti mari, mariiy marat keenik yafkune addunyal keenil taturtem itta esserak
Jannatti marak yaabe num iyyeh; diggah anu rabak lakal tan manó yangadde kataysa luk suge addunyal
Diggah atu nummaysa marâ tanitoo? yok axcuk suge
Rabneeh, burtaay, lafoofi nakke waqdi, diggah nanu ugutnaah, cisab nek abaanaah, ninni taamoomil galtimennoo? yok axcuk suge
Woo moominti Jannatal isi kataysiisik, isin girát yoo lih maay boosittan woo korostih caalat nabaluh? Iyya
Eddeluk bossu iyyeeh, jaciim deqsitta girák gudel (guddaqtal) kaa yuble
Yallal xiibita immay, diggah yoo finqise raarte koo oggolinniyoy, kaak (kay kataysay addunyal rabak lakal manó tanim angadduk suge kinnuk) iyya woo moominti
Kaadu yi-Rabbi isi muxxóh tirri yoo heewannay, kôo luk girál xayyoysimeeh tet cule marih num akkuk-en
Nanu waaraah rabewaa mara hinninom hinnaa
Marabna nek naharsi rabay addunyal abne akke waytek, kaadu nanu diggalsimewaa mara hinnino innaa Jannat culleek lakal
Diggah nanu niqmatak edde nanim, usuk kaxxa affaafa
Annah yan niqmatay dudda- leh taamita mari toysa taamitay addunyal
Woo weeló kak taturte jannatih niqmatannaa, qibnaytiinoh taysem, hinnay zaqhqhuum deqsitta caxay cooxuk gactah taniy jahannam addal tani tayseeh
Diggah nanu korosuh aqayyaareh (mokkoroh) tet abne (zaqhqhuum kinnuk)
Diggah is jaciim deqsitta girák ragidik tawqe caxa
Tet mexexi diggah usuk sheetoonâ moyyaayih inna-le qaxumaaneh
Eddeluk diggah usun teetik yakmeeniih, bagitte teetik kiban
Tohuk lakal diggah tet bagul niqna kak caddok taturte leeh daragu-lon maaqabah
Too digaaláh lakal diggah gacsimeyna keenik jaciim deqsitta girâ fanah takke
Diggah usun sinni abbobti makkoote marah geen
Usun wohul ken katayyuh yasissiken
Kaadu Nummah nabiyow ku- marak duma naharsi marak maggo mari makkoote
Kaadu nummah Yallih digaalák ken meesissa farmoytit keenih rubne addunyal
Tokkel meesiisen marih ellecabo kah tekke inna wagitey (cubbusey) nabiyow
Yallih naqoosay Yalli isi racmatat caglisey naggoyse akke waytek, qibaadá kaah cagliseenimih sabbatah
Yalli xiibitak iyyeh; Nabii Nuuc neh seeceh kay maral qokol kaah nakkem keh, tokkel nanu kaa oggola marak yayse mara kinnino
Kaadu kaa kee kay buxah maraay, moominiiniy kaâ luk teemene kaxxa gibdak naggosneh (leet xuunumaanamak, sutaanamak)
Kaadu kay samad raaqe mara ken abne, kay mari leet bayeek gamadal
Kaadu meqe xagar-xagoo kee fayla kay amol cabne ellecabô maray kaak lakal yamaatuwaah arrabat
Sinam addal Nabii Nuucuh saayaay nagaynan cabne
Diggah nanu meqe mara tonnal galatna
Diggah Nabii Nuuc ni-naqoosay teemeney Yallah qibaadá caglissek numuk teyna
Tohuk lakal aki maray kaa dirabboyse leet xuumusneeh (sutusne) finqisne
Kaadu diggah kay (Nabii Nuuc kinnuk) gital kaa kataate marat Nabii Ibraahim yan
Isi Rabbil saytun sorkocô baxa luk yemeete waqdi Yallat agleyta haamak
Isi abbaa kee isi marak Yallak kalah maca taqbudeniih iyye waqdi ken assacakkuk
Yallak kalah gersi yallitte diraabah taqbudenim faxxaanaa
Tohul ginô Rabbi maca siinik abelem takkaleeniih, Yallak kalihim tuqbudeenik
Tokkel ken qiidih keenil luk yawqeemik malkitih cutuukâ fanah wagittoh wagga hee
Edde luk diggah anu biyaakitah keenik iyye
Edde luk derre kaat cabba heenih gexen
Eddeluk ken yallitte fan sissikuk kelli iyyeeh (malgiyeh) matakmaanaa? iyye keenil anqasak
Maca liton kah yaabe waytaanaah essero yol kah gacse waytaanam keenik iyye Nabii Ibraahim
Edde luk Nabii Ibraahim keenit yufkuneh migdi gabah godmat ken aagaruk
Tokkel sissikuk naqabu luk kay mari kaah fan yufkuneeh nanu tet naqbudeeh, atu tet taggilee kaak iyyen
Isin sinni gabah urtaanam taqbudeenii, sin gine Rabbî qibaadá cabba hayteenih keenik iyye
Yalli sin kee isin abba haytaanam gineh anuk
Nabii Ibraahim Yaabah keenik yeyse waqdi, tokkel kay mari uma malah kaah malseeh xiso kaah xisaay jaciim deqsitta girát kaa gasiya (qambisa) iyyen
Kay mari uma malah kaah malseeh, guba raaqa mara ken abneeh, Nabii Ibraahim girák amaanah yewqe
Kaadu Nabii Ibraahim iyyeh; diggah anu guuroh inni Rabbî fan gexaah usuk tirri yoo heele (yoo ascassele)
Nabii Ibraahim Yi-Rabbow meqe marih loowot yan baxa yoh acuw iyye
Eddeluk dooqá kaak oggolleeh kaxxa xiq-le baxal kaa aytikumusne (berrakisne)

Ismaaqil yembeeh barak abballuk taamáh edde gexa caddo yoofe waqdi, yi-baxaw diggah anu soonol koo asguudem ublek, a-caagid wagitey maca kot ceela? Kaak iyye. Yi-babbaw elle amrisimtem ab, wohul Yalli faxek yisbire marih numuh yoo geettok kaak iyye
Edde luk Yallih amri oggolen waqdi (Nabii Ibraahim kee baxa kinnuk) abba seltah (xabanah) kaa oobise kaa yasgaaduh
Kaadu kaa secneh kee Ibraahimow axcuk
Nummah tuble soonó nummasseh, diggah nanu tonnal galatna meqe mara iyye Yalli
Diggah ta-amri (ku baxih masgaada kinnuk) is-baxxaqqa itta aqayyaare kinni
Kaadu nanu kaxxa maruwih (marugih) masgaadal kaa wadne (Ismaaqil kinnuk)
Kaadu Nabii Ibraahimih meqe xagar-xagoo kee fayla kay amol cabne elle cabô maray kaak lakal yamaatuwaah arraabat
Yallih xaquk nagaynan Nabii Ibraahimil yanay
Nabii Ibraahim kah galatne innah meqe mara tonnal galatna
Diggah Nabii Ibraahim ni- naqoosay teemenek numuk teyna
Kaadu Nabii Ibraahim Iscaaqh deqsita baxay Nabii yakkuwaay meqe marak numuk teynah yanil kaa ayti-kumusne (berrakisne)
Kaadu kaa (Ibraahim) kee Iscaaqhal barkat oobisne, kaadu ken nammayih samadak isi nafsih meqe num keenik yaniih, baxxaqqa-le dulmih koroosannut isi nafsi yadlume num keenit yanih
Yalli nummah xiibitak iyyeh; Nabii Muusaa kee Nabii Haaruun nabuwwannut gunneh
Kaadu ken nammay kee ken mara naggosneh kaxxa gibdak (xuumiyya kinnuk)
Kaadu ken qokolleeh, usun firqawnaa kee firqawni marak yayse mara yekken
Kaadu tawraat kitaabay baxxaqqa iyya ken nammayah necee
Kaadu ken nammay massa-le gital (Islaam diini kinnuk) tirri hayne
Kaadu meqe xagar-xagoo kee fayla ken nammayih amol cabne ellecabô maray keenik lakal yamaatuwaah arrabat
Yallih xaquk nagaynan Nabii Muusaa kee Nabii Haaruunul yanay
Diggah ken nammay kah galatne innah nanu meqe mara tonnal galatna
Diggah ken nammay Ni-naqoosay teemenek nammayak teyna
Kaadu diggah Nabii Ilyaas rubsumte farmoytiitik numuk teyna
Isi marak israa-iil xaylok Yallak ma-meesittaanaa? iyye waqdi keenih cus nabiyow
Numtin-welluy baqla deqsita taqbudeeniih, ginó-abák yayse gineynih qibaadá cabtaanaa
Yalli sin Rabbiy sin gineey, siinik naharsi abbobti gine Rabbi kinni
Eddeluk kay mari kaa dirabboyseeh, diggah usun gaaboysime loonuuh xayyowsime-lon girâ digaaláh
Yallih naqoosay Yalli isi racmat caglisey naggoyse akke waytek qibaadá kaah cagliseenimih sabbatah
Kaadu Nabii Ilyaas meqe xagar- xagoo kee fayla kay amol cabne ellecabô maray kaak lakal yamaatuwaah arrabat
Yallih xaquk nagaynan Nabii ĮIlyaasal yanay
Diggah Nabii Ilyaas kah galatne innah Nanu meqe mara tonnal galatna
Diggah Nabii Ilyaas ni-naqoosay teemenek numuk teyna
Kaadu diggah Nabii Luut rubsumte farmoytiitik numuk teyna
Nabiyow keenih cus; Nabii Luut kee kaal yeemene mara inkih digaalák naggosne waqdi
Idaltô daaqaynay (Nabii Luut barra kinnuk) digaalát raaqe maray finqitê luk raqte akke waytek koroositteemih sabbatah
Lakat Nabii Luut marak aka maray raqqayey kaa dirabboyse bayisneh
Kaadu diggah isin Makki maraw ken abuural taturak maacissan
Kaadu bar elle taturtaanahak kas elle mageytaanaa? Ken geytem sin geytaamak
Kaadu diggah Nabii Yuunus rubsumte farmoytiitik numuk teyna
Nabiyow keenih cus ; Nabii Yuunus isi marih naqabuh sinaamak kibuk tan doynik fan kude waqdi
Kaxxa haffó woo doynik marteeh tokkel meesiten waqdi doynik mari saami caxxa qideeh, Nabii Yuunus saami-caxxal kak yeysen marih num yekke
Badat kaa qideeniih, eddeluk kullunti kaa yunxuqe, usuk assacokka lem baahe numuh anuk
Diggah usuk Yalla maggom cusa marih numuh suge wannay
Kullinti bagut edde ugtan ayrô fan sugak yen (qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk)
Eddeluk kullinti baguk baddi afal deebol kaa qambisne usuk lakmisak
Yaqhtiin deqsita cooxuk caxá (xalâ caxá kinnuk) kay amol nuysubuke
Kaadu kay marak bool alfi yakke marah kaa rubne, hinnay wohuk fulaanah
Eddeluk kaa nummayseeniih, edde raban wakti keenik yamaatem fanah ken hatkisneh
Eddeluk nabiyow ken esser; ku- Rabbi say-xaylo leeh, usun lab- xaylo loonuu
Hinnak Malayka sayyoh ginnee usun abaluk
Oobbiyooy! diggah usun sinni diraabah iyyaanah
Yalli xaleh iyyan, diggah usun dirableelá kinnuk
Yalli say-xayló dooritee lab- xaylok
Kee a-maraw maca liton! Mannal mekeltan Yallah say-xayló teexegeeniih, sinnih lab-xaylo teexegen waqdi
Makassittaanaa! Yalli barráa kee xaylo aallewaah, kak saytunnoowem
Hinnak baxxaqqa iyya sumaq litoonuu a-ittaanamal
Toysa sin kitaabay Yallih xaquk litoonu baahay, a-ittaanamal numma yacee mara tekkeenik keenik iyyan
Koros Yallaa kee Malaykâ fanal ramaddiinuu kee lagó heen, nummah malayká teexegeh diggah usun (koros kinnuk) girá digaalál gaaboysime loonuuh xayyoysime loonum qhiyaamah ayró
Yalli saytunnooweh kaa ceele waytaamay koros kaa edde weelossak
Yallih naqoosay Yalli isi racmatat caglisey kaa ceele wayta weelot kaa weeloyse wayta akke waytek
Toysa diggah korosey sin kee isin yallitte axcuk uqbuddu haytaanam
Isin Yallih giták num makot beya mara hinniton
Koroosannuh Jaciim deqsitta girá cula numuy Yalli tet culim elle mekle akke waytek
Malayka itteh; nek inki malaykatti mayan, qaraanal yimixxige arac-le kaa akke waytek
Kaadu diggah nanu Yallih qibaadáh saffih sollá
Kaadu diggah nanu Yalla ceele waytaamak Yalla saytunnosna
Diggah nabiyow atu rubsumtak naharat Makki koros axcuk sugte
“Kitoobaa kee anbiyak naharsi maral temeetem nel amaatinnay diggah oggolak nen
Yallih naqoosay Yalli isi racmatat caglise akkuk-nen”
Makki koros Qhuraan keenil yemeete waqdi kaal koroositeeniih, akeeral digaalák loonum sarrah aaxige-lon
Nummah Ni-qangará Ni-naqoosa farmoytiitih taturteh
Diggah usun sinni naqboytiitil qoklima mara kinnon
Kaadu diggah Ni-qande maysó lem addunyaay akeeral
Toysa nabiyow derre keenit (Makki koros kinnuk) cab dago waktî fanah
Kaadu ken qambal nabiyow digaalák keenil obtuwaytam sarrah ableloonuk
Tokkel edde qataatakaanam Ni- digaalá innaa nabiyow
Tokkel Ni-digaalá ken dabooqal (maaftal) keenil obta waqdi, toysa meesiisen marih maaci maxxu yoomeeh
Kaadu nabiyow derre keenit cab yimixxige waktî fanah
Kaadu nabiyow ken qambal Ni-digaalák keenil obtuwaytam sarrah ableloonuk
Nabiyow ku-Rabbi saytunnooweh maysó-le Rabbi, kaa ceele waytaamay kaa edde weelossu haanak
Kaadu Yallak nagaynan farmoytiitil yanay
Kaadu faylá Yalli-le, ginô Rabbi
Saad- (edde faxem Yalli yaaxige), Yalli Qhuraanay kak garciteenim sinam kassiisal xiibite
Wonna hinnay koroosite mari cakkik kaxxa-mariinitaanam kee Yallaa kee Nabii cinat yanin
Makki marak duma sugte horaarik makina horá finqisneeh! eddeluk Ni-digaalá keenih temeete waqdi nee wada iyyeenih seecen, woo wakti kudim kee naggoowiyyi wakti akkewaak
Kaadu keenik yan meesiisé (Nabii Mucammad 4csafeńýķo kinnuk) keenih yemeetem qajjibsiteeniih, ah baab-li, kaxxa dirab-li itte koros
Yallitteeta inki Yalla abee Mucammad 4csafeáýķ2? Diggah tah qajiibik (cakkumuk) taniimik

Kaadu keenik kaxxa mari fooreh (koros kinnuk), sinni marak gexaay, isbira sinni yallitteh qibaadál keenik axcuk. Diggah tah Mucammad kah malse caagidik tanih tan sin diinik sin korisuuy, sin amol reeduh iyyen
A Yallih inkittinaaney Mucammmad 4rafeýķo nee kah seecah yani ellecabô diinil maabbino (Nabii Qiisâ diini kinnuk), usuk kah seecam tu-hinna diraabay ginnaasite akke waytek iyyen
Qhuraan nek fanaak Mucammadal obsimee? Tonna hinnay usun Yi- Qhuraanak agay waagat yanin nabiyow. Wonna hinnay uxih Yi- digaalá tammoyse weenik-sa woh kah iyyaanam
Hinnak ku-Rabbiy maysoleeh, kaxxa mattaccooleh racmattah kadnooni (olwá) ken xaqul maay tan
Hinnak qaranwaa kee baaxóoy, ken nammayih fanal taniimih reedá loonuu? Toysa qaran ken guddussah taniimil yawqoonay sinnih faxeenim abitoonuh
Ama korosuk koo dirabbossa qande buksumtu wayta qande keenik duma gaaboowe marak naharsi mari kah buksume innah
Nabiyow ku-marak duma Nabii Nuuc maraay, Qaad deqsita maraa kee firqawnay kaxxa qandee kee sinam edde digaalá xiikol-le inkih sinni farmoytit dirabboyseenih
Kaadu Samuuduuy, Nabii Luut maraa kee Garbô mari (Nabii Shuqeybi mara kinnuk) farmoytit dirabboyseh, toh inkih koroosannuu kee diraabal gaaboowe mara
Ama marak raaqe num mayan inkih farmoytit dirabboyseenih akke waytek. Eddeluk Yallih digaalá cakkisiteeniih keenil obteh
Ama mari qambaalam mali Israafiil baantah inki xongoló akke waytek, is idya maliiy, madaara mali Yallih amrih ummaanim bayissi haytam fan
Ni-Rabbow digaalák ni-maglab addunyal elle neh iysissik cisab ayrók (qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk) duma iyyen anqasah
Isbir nabiyow atu faxe waytaamay usun kok iyyaanal, kaadu Ni- naqsu Nabii Daawuuduy Yallih naqboytiitil qandeleeh, Yallih taaqatal sabri-le kassit. Diggah usuk Yalli kicniimih fan maggom gacé kinni
Diggah nanu qaleelá qanneh, is carraay saaku Nabii Daawuudû luk Yalla saytunnoysak
Kaadu haadá kaah qanneh, is kobxisimmi itteh Yalla kaâ luk saytunnoysak, usun inkih (qaleelaa kee haadá kinnuk) Yalli kicnim fan gacan
Kaadu Nabii Daawuuduh kay reedá kaah qandet maqarrosneeh, nubuwwannu kaah necee, kaadu yabti kurtaneh ixxiga kaah necee
Nabiyow ittawee namma numih xaagi koo yoofee, Nabii Daawuudul micraab (qibaadah arac kinnuk) koren waqdi

Nabii Daawuudul qibaadáh arac culeeniih keenik wariggite waqdi ma-meesitin! gariiy-garul caddok kak tature namma num kinninok, toysa ni-fan cakkil mekel kaak iyyen, kaadu meklal nee madluminaay, massa-le gitâ fan tirri nee hayis kaak iyyen
Keenik numukteyni diggah ah yi- toobokoytay sagla-taban kee sagla idá leeh, anu inki idá liyo. Tokkel tet yoh acuwa iyyeeh, yaabal yok yeyseh iyye

Nummah ku-idá isi illit yassagalluh kot abe esserot koo yudlumeh kaak iyye Nabii Daawuud, kaadu diggah tu-yessegelle marak maggo mari gari-garut caddok keenik tatura, Yalla nummayseeh meqe taamoomi abe mara akke waytek, usun dagoonuh caddok ittat taturewaa mari, tokkel Nabii Daawuud cagalah ama meklal kaa mokkorrem yismiteeh, isi Rabbik dambi cabti essereeh sujuuduh gomboh radak Ķaal yuduure
Tokkel too dambi kaah cabneeh, diggah usuk Ni-garil xaynaa kee meqe gacsimeyna-le akeeral

Nabii Daawuudow nanu diggah seehadah amol koo hayne baaxól ken caagiida bicissuh, toysa sinam fan cakkil mekelaay, kalbi- fayxi makataatin tonni Yallih gitak koo makelek. Diggah Yallih gitak makkoota mari gibdi digaalá-le, cisab ayró (qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk) hawweeneenimih sabbatah
Qaran kee baaxóoy ken nammayih fanal tanim deedalah magininnino, toh koroosite marih akkala, tokkel koroosite marah girâ digaaláh finqi yan qhiyaamah ayró
Hinnak yeemeneeh meqe taamoomi abe mara baaxól umaané abe marih inna ken abnaa? Hinnak Yallak meesita mara umeynit inna ken abnaa? (mabna)
Ah barkat-le kitaabay kol oobisne nabiyow, kay aayoota cubbussu haanam keh, kaadu qaafiyatah yan kas-le mari kassitam keh
Nabii Daawuuduh Suleymaan deqsita baxa necee. Nabii Suleymaan manxu meqe naqsu! Diggah usuk Yalla fan maggom gacé kinni
Carra sissik faariisiy sidiica ibah soola Nabii Suleymaanak fooca maksen waqdi cusey nabiyow
Tokkel diggah anu inni Rabbih kassitik faaris kacanu muxxuse iyye ayró reebut kay namma intik qellitti ittam fanah (korru ittam fan)
Yol tet gacisa iyyeh eddeluk arqoo kee fillitte teetik yargiqem (yaatukem) qimbise tu-maleelah maaqó takkem keh
Nummah Nabii Suleymaan mokkorreeh, rabe seehadaytih garab (kay agabuk tiyak teyna xalte galaloh garab kinnuk) ķorsil kaak qidne. Tohuk lakal Yallal yuduureeh yotoobe
Yi-Rabbow dambi yoh cabaay, yok wadir num geewaa reedá yoh acuw iyye. Diggah atu kaxxa acwa-li kinnitok
Tokkel dooqá kaak oggolleeh, caacay kaah qanneh usuk faxa ikke xabcinuk caalih kay amrih gexak
Kaadu sheetoonak xisne abba haytaamaay, badat kummu ittam inkih kaah qanne
Kaadu keenik aka maray silsilootat axawah yani kaah qanne
Yalli Nabii Suleymaanak iyyeh; tah Ni-mattaccook faxxa marah keenik acuy, hinnay keenik faxxa marak waas, wohul cisab kol mayanak
Kaadu diggah Nabii Suleymaan Ni-xaqul xayna leeh, meqe gacsimeyna-le akeeral
Nabiyow cus Ni-naqsu Nabii Ayyuub, isi-Rabbih seece waqdi, diggah sheetan yoo xageeh, yi- xagaral taqabiiy biyaakak sabab yekke axcuk
Ibá baaxót atukku hayis, daritta leey xabciniy edde kaqaltaah kak taaqubey edde qaffotta koh awqelek kaak iyye Yalli
Tokkel kaa qaffosneeh, barráa kee xaylooy wonnah tanim keenilluk ossantinah kaah necee, woh inkih Nek yan racmatay kaah abne, kaadu usuk abe sabri qaafiyatah yan kas-le marah kassit yakkem keh

Kaadu Yalli kaak iyyeh; ku-gabat faxiiqak axaw hiriggi hayisaay isi barrá edde atukku hayis xiibá maggalinay. diggah nanu sabri-le numuh kaa geyne mokkorol (Nabii Ayyuub kinnuk). Nabii Ayyuub manxu meqe naqsu! Diggah usuk Yalla fan maggom gacé kinni
Kaadu nabiyow cus ni-naqoosa; Nabii Ibraahimiiy, Nabii Iscaaqh kee Nabii Yaq-qhuub, usun qibaadál baari-le maraay, diini ixxiga-le mara
Diggah nanu caglisitan kaxxa tiyat ken caglisne, akeerâ kassit ken lubbit hayneemil
Kaadu diggah usun Ni-garil meqe maray dorsime kinnon
Kaadu nabiyow cus ni-naqoosa, Nabii Ismaaqiliiy, Al-yasaqaa kee Dalkifli, usun inkih Yalli ginók doore mara
Nabiyow ama anbiyak maqaanék koh cusnem kassiisi, diggah Yallak meesita mari meqe gacsimeyna-le akeeral
Qadni deqsitta jannoota lon, afoofi keenih fakimut kak anuk
Tet addal qaraakiyil qaxah anuk maggo caxâ mixuu kee yaaqubeenim tet addal esseritan
Kaadu sinni baqoltik-sa numû fan waktewaa agabuy fooduh (wadaayah) yani lon
Amah addunyal kah xagnisimten niqmata moominiiney cisab ayróh (qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk)
Diggah amah Ni-rizqhiy ambaxe sinniy aggiriqqewaa keenik iyya Yalli
Ama weelot kak yabne niqmoota Yallak meesita marih iimi. Diggah koroosannuu kee umaanét caddok tatre mari uma gacsimeyna le akeeral
Woh jahannam giráy culaana, is maxxu keenih gacta fidooy
Amah niqna caddok kak taturte lee kee girâ marih qasaalayih (qasleyih) digaalák tet tammoysoonay keenik iyyan
Kaadu aká (gersi) digaaláy woo digaalá celtay maggo qaynatah tani lon
Keenik iyyaanah; ah buttay girá siinî luk culta, arcibaa kee konnabah loonum malon, diggah usun girá culáy teetit cararta kinnon
Kataye mari kataaten marak iyyeh; wonna hinnay siini arcibaa kee konnabá sinnim, a-giráh digaalá neh xayyossem siini makot nee beyten waqdi addunyal, tokkel maxxu gaca dabqiiy jahannam dabqi
Katayte butta itteh; Ni-Rabbow ah neh xayyoyseeh makot nee bee numuh xirribuh tan digaalá kaah osis girál
Kaadu umeynit itteh; maca lino addunyal uma marat loowak sugne labha kah able waynam
Addunyal nanu keenit abne buraa kee anqas hoxak abnee? hinnay usun girál neê luk anuk ken able waytam ni-intiitaay
Diggah woo girâ mari sittat aba giddii kee keemaari nummay agay- waaga sinni
Ixxic nabiyow isi marak; cagalah anu meesiiseey, hebeltô Yalli mayan inki Yallay dirkiseh yaniy qibaadá dubuk cakkisita akke waytek
Qaranwaa kee baaxóoy, ken nammayih fanal taniimih Rabbi mayso-li, dambi cabti-li kaal gace marah
Ixxic nabiyow isi marak; ama Qhuraan kaxxa xaaguy tuxxiq-le
Isin derre kaat cabtaanaah, kaal mataamittan
Irô qaraanal tan malayka itta elle wayteemih ixxiga luk mananniyo, Nabii Aadam ginóh caagidil itta keemaarisen waqdi Yallak wacyi yol oobewannay
Yalli wacyi yol moobisa cagalah anu Yallih digaalák baxxaqqa-le meesiise siinih kinniyom akke waytek
Nabiyow cus :ku-Rabbi Malaykak anu diggah seehadaytu kallak gineyyo iyye waqdi (Nabii Aadam kinnuk)
Edde luk ginó kaak missossuuy, Yi-xaquk yan rooci kaat fuufussu haa waqdi, toysa sujuuduh kaah rada massakaxxah keenik iyye Yalli
Tokkel Malayka usun inkih tikki yaanamaak sujuuduh raden
Kaxxamariiniteeh koroosite marih num yekke ibliisty sujuud cine akķke waytek
Yalli kaak iyyeh; ibliisow inni namma gabat gine Aadamah kummattaamak maca koo waasseeh ? away kaxxamariinitta innaa, hinnay dumaak Yallal kaxxamariinite marih numuh sugteeh
Ibliis isi Rabbil gacisak, anu kaak ayseh, yoo girak ginteeh, kaa kallak ginte iyye
Yalli kaak iyyeh ; toysa jannatak eweq, diggah atu Yi- racmatak xiiriyime num kinnitok
Kaadu diggah Yi-abaaró ku-amol tan galtóh ayrô fanah (qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk)
Ibliis iyyeh ; toysa Yi-Rabbow yoo qambaalis ginó sinni magooqak edde ugsumtu wayta ayrô fanah (qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk)
Yalli kaak iyyeh :diggah atu qambalsima marih num kinnito
Wakti kak yimixxige ayrô fanah (naharsi baantá edde takke ayró kinnuk)
tokkel ku-nabnal xiibita immay inkih ken (Aadam xaylo kinnuk) makkoyseyyo iyye ibliis
Ku-naqoosak isi qibaadá caglisse moominiin akke waytek qibaadá koh cagliseenimih sabbatah
Yalli iyyeh; cakki Yok yaniih, cakkik-sa axcem mayyu
Diggah jahannam kibeyyo koo kee ku-samadaay, seehadak koo katatta haytem inkih
Ixxic nabiyow:ama korosuk; siinit aba seecol hebeltô galtó sin messeraay, aneewaytam bicsita marih num anu hinniyo Yallak yol ooba wacyi kataata ikkal
A-Qhuraan kalah tanim hinna ginóh (seehadaa kee ginni kinnuk), kassis yakkem akke waytek
Kaadu diggah aaxigetton a-korosey kay (Qhuraan kinnuk) xaaguu kee kay numma udduruuk (waktiik) wadiril
Ama Qhuraanih oobiyyi Yallay mayso-le naggaarah yanih kabuk yekke
A-nabiyow nanu diggah Qhuraan kitab nummal kol oobisne, toysa Yalla uqbud diini kaah caglisak

Oobbiyooy! Cagalah tan qibaaday saytunnowte lem dubuk Yalla, Yallak kalah awlaytit haysite mari iyyah; ken manaqbuda Yallat xayyoysiyyah nee xayyoysaanâ gidih akke waytek. Diggah Yalli usun diini caagidik itta elle waak sugeenimil ken fan meklah qhiyaamah ayró, diggah Yalli tirri mahaa isi Rabbi dirabboyseeh, koroosannut caddok tature num
Yalli baxa haysitam faxinnay, isih ginaamak isih faxam dooritak yen, Yalli saytunih, Usuk inki Yallay isih ginem dirkiséh yani

Yalli Qaranwaa kee baaxó nummal gine, bar laqót culsaah, laqó barat culsa, kaadu ayróo kee alsá isi naqoosah tuxxiiqih qane, ken nammayak kulli tiya muggaqsime waktî fanah gexxa (qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk). Oobbiya! Yalli mayso-li, dambi cabti-li kay naqoosak kaal yuduure marah

Sinaamey sin Rabbi inki nafsik (Aadam kinnuk) sin gineeh, tohuk lakat kay barrá kaak gine (Caawa kinnuk) kaadu lacak bacra qaynat siinih oobise lab-tii kee say-tiyah anuk, sin inaanih bagut sin gina ginóok-ginô lakal (qunxuffeey, dabloytaay, cadoyta kinnuk) sidiica diteh addat (baguuy, maxaxaay, urri- walammâ dite kinnuk). Toh sin Yallaay, sin Rabbi ummaanim giné, reedá lem Ķaa, Kaak-sá cakkil yaqbuden Yalli mayanak, toysa diggah Kay qibaadák mannal makkottaanaah

Sinaamey koroositten sin tekkek, toysa diggah Yalli siinik gaddali siinih maceyta, kaadu isi naqoosah koroosannu makicniiy, kaa faatitteenik siinik akcinele. Kaadu dambi-le nafsi aka nafsih dambi mayassukuqqa. Tohuk lakat siinik gacsimeyná sin Rabbi fan takkeeh, abak sugteenim siinih warsele, diggah Usuk sin alilwat tanim yaaxigi qellitti ittaamak

Seehadaytu gibdaabini xaga waqdi isi Rabbi kallacaah cató kaat faxa kaal adaaruk, tohuk lakat Yalli isi niqmat kaah yecee kaa tekkek, duma kaa edde kallacak sugeh yanim habbaalaah, Yallat agleytit haa kay gitak sinam makkoysam keh. A-nabiyow ama korostak ixxic; isi koroosannut dagoh gide hatak, diggah atu girâ marih num kinnitok

Ama korostay isi koroosannut hatka yayse innaa, hinnak soolak kummaatak barti-saaqoota isi Rabbi yateeqe numuy akeerâ digaalák meesitaah isi Rabbih racmatah sangeela yayseeh? A-nabiyow ixxic; yaaxige maraa kee aaxigewaa mara maay missowta? (ma-missowta) cagalah kassittaah taaxigem qaafiyatah yan kas-le mara

A-nabiyow Yi-naqoosak yeemene marak sinni Rabbik meesita keenik ixxic, a-addunyal sinni Rabbih qibaadá yeymeeqe mari akeeral maqaané-le (jannat kinnuk). kaadu Yallih baaxó farakka lek sinni Rabbi elle taqbudê rike guuruma. Cagalah yisbire marah ken galtó keenih cisab maleh dudsumta
A-nabiyow sinaamak ixxic ; diggah anu Yalla aqbudeemih amrisime qibaadá kaah caglisak
Kaadu muslimiin naharsittu akkeemih amrisime yi-ummattak
A-nabiyow sinaamak ixxic ; diggah anu inni Rabbih amri cinek kaxxa ayróh (qhiyaamah ayró kinnuk) digaalák meesita
A-nabiyow ixxic ; Yalla aqbude inni qibaadá kaah caglisak

Toysa Yallak kalah faxxa hayteenim uqbuda a-korosey cinteenik. A-nabiyow ixxic; diggah finqittem sinni nafsii kee sinni buxah mara finqise mara qhiyaamah ayró. oobbiya! Too finqi usuk baxxaqqa-le finqa
Woo mari qhiyaamah ayró giráy irok ken buultaah, gubak ken buulta lon. Too digaalát Yalli isi naqoosa meesiisa cibbarsimaanam (cubbusaanam) keh, Yi-naqoosay toysa Yok meesita
Sheetan taaqat kee Yallak kalihim yaqbudeenimik yexxeere maray Yallal yuduure usun ayti-kuma lon, toysa nabiyow Yi-naqoosa ayti- kumus
A-nabiyow ayti-kumus Yi- naqoosay maxcó ankacissaah taysem (Yallih maxcoo kee Yallih farmoytih maxcó) kak katatta, woo mari Yalli tirri ken hee kaadu woo mari usun qaafiyatah yan kas-le mara
Digaalâ qangara elle nummatte nun tirri haytam duddaa nabiyow? Toysa atu girál yan num waddam duddaa? (madudda)
Kinnih immay sinni Rabbik meesite mari jannatal fayya itta qarway xisoh ittak amol taniy weeqaytitte kak guba gexxa lon, woh Yalli isi naqoosay kaak meesittah cule xagna, Yalli isi xagna ma-maka

A-nabiyow matablaa diggah Yalli qaraanak lee oobiseeh baaxót tet culseeh, darooriy weqta tet abe, tohuk lakal maggo qaynatah tan buqrey bisi kak sissini (baxsa- le) teetit yayyaaqe, tohuk lakat kaftaah walqinuk tet table, tohuk lakat cafulay buluule tet aba Yalli. Diggah tama Yallih abinak cusneemit qaafiyatah yan kas-le marah kassis edde yan

Yalli islaamaninnoh alil kak fake num, edde luk isi Rabbik noorii kee tirtô bagul yani, usuk lubbi kak alifut yan numuy islaamaninnot derre cabeh inna maay kinni? (hinna) Yallih dikrik (Qhuraan kinnuk) sorkocô baxitte kak kafteeh, derre edde cabe marah toysa fingi yan, woo mari baxxaqqa-le makoh addat yan cakkik

Yalli yayse yab oobise (Qhuraan kinnuk), kitaabay maxcô maqaaneh tuuy-tu kak celtay xaganaa kee meesisso elle qagam-qagittay sinni Rabbik meesita marih arooba kak dibillitta meesih, tohuk lakat ken aroobaa kee ken sorkocô baxitte Yallih cusiyyah xabbacowtah, toh Yallih tirtóy isih faxe mara tirri elle haa, Yalli iimaanak makkoyse num tirri hée mali, Yalli a Qhuraanal yaamineemik makkoyse num tirri kaa haa num mali
Girát qiden numuy uma digaalát fooca garaysa yayse innaa, hinnay digaalák amaan geeh jannat cula num yayseeh qhiyaamah ayró? Kaadu daalimiinik addunyal abak sugten umaanéh galtó tammoysa keenik iyyan
Nabiyow ku-marak duma naharsi mari dirabboyseeh, tokkel digaalá kak aaxige waan kabuk keenit temeete
Edde luk Yalli addunyâ manol qunxaaneey, xixxibaane ken tammoyseeh, akeerâ digaalá wohuuk nabuk raqta aaxaguk suginnoonuy (koros KĶinnuk)
Kaadu nummah Yalli xiibitak iyyeh; ama Qhuraanih addal sinaamah ummaan ceelalloolak ceelallo noogore kassita mara yakkeenî gidah
Qarab afat yan Qhuraanay makooka sinni kaa abne Yallak meesita mara yakkeenî gidah

Yalli ceelallo yoogore; agleh yan mari itta elle waa numuy naqasuh yanii kee cagalah num dubuk leh yan naqasul, a nammay massoowaa ceelalloh? (ma-massoowa). Yalli dudda-le fayla dubuk-le, wonna hinnay maggo mari keenik ma- yaaxiga
A-nabiyow diggah atu rabetto, kaadu diggah usun rabe lon
Tohuk lakat sinaamey diggah isin qhiyaamah ayró sin Rabbih xaqul keemaaritetton, tokkel Yalli sin fan qadlil mekle-le
